General.Name: Chongqing Jianshe Motorcycle Co Ltd
General.Description: Chongqing Jianshe Vehicle System Co., Ltd. engages in manufacturing and sale of automotive air-conditioning compressors in China and internationally. The company offers rotary vane, swash-plate, and electric compressors. It is also involved in the design and manufacture of tooling and molds, and provision of related technical services; production and sale of motorcycle engines; research, development, and processing of mechanical and electrical products, home appliances, bicycles, and environmental protection products; import, wholesale, retail, and commission agency of various products. The company was formerly known as Chongqing Jianshe Motorcycle Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Chongqing Jianshe Vehicle System Co., Ltd. in December 2017. The company was founded in 1889 and is headquartered in Chongqing, China. Chongqing Jianshe Vehicle System Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of China South Industries Group Corporation.
